name: The Bunny-Sitting Club (Unfinished demo)
description:
You play as Kaguya, a girl who hasn't been so involved in school. When she's told to join a club for a higher grade,  She sets her sights on the "not-really-a-club" bunny sitting club ran by Hibiki, a quiet but caring girl. Upon joining Hibiki, Kaguya learns the importance of responsibility and friendship.

(I made this for a jam last year but didn't really have a plan for it so I never finished it. I decided to share it here since it's been available on cloudnovel already. It's bare bones and super short but I hope you still like it)
